properties.title: Open-Source Java implementation of the german DTAUS file format
properties.author: Christian Schulte

section.name: Introduction
section.p: jDTAUS provides an open-source implementation of the german DTAUS file format for the Java platform.

To get you going a GUI application is available demonstrating all features directly provided by the API. It is distributed using Java-Webstart. You will first have to install the latest Java Runtime Environment available at www.java.com. After downloading and installing Java, the following link will web-start the application.

section.name: Download

tr.td: All-in-one Windows installation executable. This installation executable includes a Java runtime environment. You do not need to download Java separately when using this download.
Unix tar archive. This archive does not include a Java runtime environment. You will have to install the Java runtime environment appropriately to your system.

section.p: For older releases, please browse the Sourceforge File Release System
